title: Alexei Navalny - Wikipedia
snippet: Navalny and the FBK have published investigations detailing alleged corruption by high-ranking Russian officials and their associates. title: Russian Supreme Court liquidates ‘Russia of the Future’ — the party that kept Navalny from registering his political party back in 2019 — Meduza
snippet: The “Russia of the Future” party that was dismantled on Monday, September 21, first appeared on the Justice Ministry’s list of registered political parties at the end of May 2019.
